issue.title: [Python][Java] ArrowType.Int object has no attribute 'isSigned'
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5729](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5729). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This failure has recently occured on the master and on other PRs https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/550245616
Seemingly there isn't any related changes which could cause it.
